pages.text: Tofu in this world is special.$(br2) and when you harden the tofu, you can make armor etc. using the material of hard tofu. $(br2)(don't do that on kinu tofu)
This is how to harden tofu.
pages.name: Harden Structure

pages.text: This tofu is mainly used for building materials, etc.
Tofu Metal can be done when it is hardened to the end.$(br2)A little weaker than iron, but will be the best material.
